attributes.action: make health and education equal in the united kingdom
attributes.additional_details: THE ENGLISH HAVE TO PAY MORE TAX THAN THE OTHER UK COUNTRIES AS SEEN IN THE PRESCRIPTION CHARGES, DENTAL , SENIOR CARE AND THE GRADUATE TAX OF THE TUITION FEES. THIS SUMMOUNTS TO HIGHER TAXES FOR HEALTH AND EDUCATION FOR THE ENGLISH. WE ALL PAY INTO THE UNITED KINGDOM  TAX FUND AND HEALTH AND EDUCATION IS A BASIC EQUAL RIGHT TO HAVE THE SAME AS ALL OTHER UK CITIZENS AND NOT BE TAXED MORE TO RECEIVE IT.
